main event: Three stationary elliptical objects were observed shining in the sky over Dayton, Ohio in 1952.
interesting points: The objects were low in altitude, higher than a telephone pole., The observation lasted about 2 minutes., The objects moved smoothly as they hovered without any apparent connection., Witnesses described the objects as brilliant bluish-white lights., The incident is recorded as unidentified in the Project Blue Book documentation.
witness description: No specific witnesses were detailed in the report.
